main event: On October 22, 1967, three witnesses reported seeing an unidentified object with flashing lights in Bellerose, New York.
interesting points: The object displayed three full lines of white lights that flashed from left to right.,The object appeared to move in an erratic manner, and there was no sound.,Witnesses described the object as resembling a bright light that changed to dim red or orange.,The observers estimated the object was about 5-10 miles away and moving at a high rate of speed.,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes.
sighted object: object with flashing lights resembling overhead marquee lights
witness description: a female witness, her sister, and a family friend observed the object.
